description: This file defines a mock class 'FrontPanelMock' which implements the 'IFrontPanel' interface for testing purposes within a C++ project. It uses Google Mock to create mock methods for various front panel control functions, such as adjusting brightness, power LEDs, and setting indicator lights.

classes.name: FrontPanelMock
classes.description: Mock implementation of the IFrontPanel interface for testing front panel controls.

methods.name: Configure
methods.description: Mocks the configuration method which sets up the front panel service.

methods.name: GetBrightness
methods.description: Mocks retrieving the brightness setting for a given index.

methods.name: GetFrontPanelLights
methods.description: Mocks retrieving supported front panel lights information.

methods.name: PowerLedOff
methods.description: Mocks turning off a power LED specified by index.

methods.name: PowerLedOn
methods.description: Mocks turning on a power LED specified by index.

methods.name: SetBlink
methods.description: Mocks setting blink behavior with provided information.

methods.name: SetBrightness
methods.description: Mocks setting the brightness for a specified index.

methods.name: SetLED
methods.description: Mocks setting an LED indicator's brightness, color, and RGB values.

calls: MOCK_METHOD(hresult, GetBrightness, (const string& index, uint32_t &brightness, bool &success), (override))
MOCK_METHOD(hresult, SetBrightness, (const string& index, const uint32_t brightness, FrontPanelSuccess &success), (override))

MOCK_METHOD(hresult, SetLED, (const string& ledIndicator, const uint32_t brightness, const string& color, const uint32_t red, const uint32_t green, const uint32_t blue, FrontPanelSuccess &success), (override))
